About Me

Shruti Bhargava

I am a senior year undergraduate student pursuing Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering at IIT Kanpur.

Last summer, I interned at Microsoft Research, Bangalore with the Machine Learning group working on anomaly detection.

Previously I was a Research Fellow at Max Planck Institute for Informatics, Saarbrucken. I enjoy designing algorithms for challenging problems in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing and Computer Vision.

My Career

I am a senior year undergraduate student pursuing Computer Science & Engineering.

Jun 2017

Anomaly Detection in Internet of Things (IoT) Datasets

Internship - Proposed a bag of features for time-series achieving 85% accuracy in AP and 99% in WARD with model sizes as low as 2 KB

My Projects

Online Object Tracking using Gaussian Processes

Saplatform is a automated service for operations, it has asset management, project release, database access function, it can control mass servers.

Jalpc

Jalpc is a simple, beautiful and swift theme for Jekyll. It has comprehensive function, it can be easily used and edited. It's adapted for many kinds devices.

Jalpc-A

It is a web font application written by Angularjs and deployed by Jekyll on github (gh-pages), the backend platform is Leancloud, you can use Parse as well.

Rsser

Rsser is an Ionic application, with this application we can read news and articles freely, you can add rss address from the given list and add it manually.
